thread.section_title: Hotel Atmospheres - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Superb!
thread.title_full: Superb! - Review of Hotel Atmospheres, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: bonbon
title: Superb!
text:
Our stay was wonderful: fantastic location - easy walking distance to some major Parisian attractions..
( Notre Dame, Louvre, Pompidou etc) and restaurants and shops..
The rooms were very comfortable ;not large but that's the norm.. but well- planned with everything you need..
Breakfast was included in our room price and was great .. Fresh and tasty buffet with a wide selection of food and drinks ..
(except the eggs which seemed like powdered eggs.. hard-boiled would be better or better yet omelettes)
The staff were extremely friendly and helpful- each and everyone we
encountered..
Altogether a pleasure!!!
I would definitely return!!!
